title: Privacy Policy
content:
# Privacy Policy

**Last Updated: {{EFFECTIVE_DATE}}**

{{COMPANY_NAME}} ("Company," "we," "us," or "our") operates {{WEBSITE_URL}} (the "Site"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our Site or purchase our products.

By using the Site, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

---

## 1. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date. For significant changes, we will notify you via email or prominent notice on the Site.

We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

---

## 2. How We Collect and Use Your Personal Information

### 2.1 Information You Provide

We collect information you voluntarily provide:

**Contact Information**
- Name, email address, phone number
- Shipping and billing addresses

**Account Information**
- Username and password
- Account preferences

**Payment Information**
- Credit card details (processed securely by third-party processors)
- Billing information

**Order Information**
- Purchase history
- Product preferences

**Communication Data**
- Customer service inquiries
- Reviews and feedback
- Survey responses

**Profile Information**
- Skin type and concerns (for personalized recommendations)
- Beauty preferences

### 2.2 Information Collected Automatically

When you visit our Site, we automatically collect:

**Device Information**
- IP address
- Browser type and version
- Operating system
- Device identifiers

**Usage Data**
- Pages visited and time spent
- Click patterns
- Referring URLs
- Search queries

**Location Data**
- General geographic location (based on IP)

### 2.3 How We Use Your Information

We use collected information to:

- Process and fulfill your orders
- Create and manage your account
- Provide customer support
- Send order confirmations and shipping updates
- Personalize your shopping experience
- Recommend products based on your preferences
- Send promotional emails (with your consent)
- Improve our Site and services
- Analyze usage patterns
- Detect and prevent fraud
- Comply with legal obligations

---

## 3. Cookies

### 3.1 What Are Cookies

Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our Site. They help us recognize you and remember your preferences.

### 3.2 Types of Cookies We Use

| Type | Purpose |
|------|----------|
| **Essential** | Required for Site functionality (shopping cart, checkout, login) |
| **Performance** | Analyze how visitors use the Site (Google Analytics) |
| **Functional** | Remember your preferences and settings |
| **Marketing** | Deliver relevant advertisements and track campaign effectiveness |

### 3.3 Web Beacons

We may use web beacons (pixel tags) in emails to track open rates and click-through rates.

### 3.4 Managing Cookies

You can control cookies through your browser settings:
- Block all cookies
- Accept only first-party cookies
- Delete cookies when you close your browser

Note: Disabling cookies may affect Site functionality.

### 3.5 Google Analytics

We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors interact with our Site. Google Analytics uses cookies to collect anonymous information. You can opt out using the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on.

---

## 4. How We Disclose Personal Information

### 4.1 Service Providers

We share information with trusted third parties who assist our operations:

- Payment processors (Stripe, PayPal)
- Shipping carriers (USPS, DHL, FedEx)
- Email service providers
- Analytics providers
- Customer service platforms
- Cloud hosting providers

These providers are contractually obligated to protect your information.

### 4.2 Business Partners

With your consent, we may share information with:
- Marketing partners
- Affiliate partners

### 4.3 Legal Requirements

We may disclose information when required by law or to:
- Comply with legal process
- Protect our rights and property
- Prevent fraud or illegal activities
- Protect user safety

### 4.4 Business Transfers

If we are involved in a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your information may be transferred. We will notify you of any such change.

### 4.5 With Your Consent

We may share information for other purposes with your explicit consent.

**We do NOT sell your personal information to third parties.**

---

## 5. Third-Party Websites and Links

Our Site may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of any sites you visit.

---

## 6. Children's Data

Our Site is not intended for children under 13 (or 16 in some jurisdictions). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

If we discover we have collected information from a child, we will delete it promptly. If you believe a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}.

---

## 7. Security and Retention of Your Information

### 7.1 Security Measures

We implement appropriate safeguards to protect your information:

- SSL/TLS encryption for data transmission
- Secure password protection
- Encrypted storage
- Access controls
- Regular security assessments

However, no method of transmission is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

### 7.2 Data Retention

We retain your information for as long as necessary to:
- Provide our services
- Comply with legal obligations
- Resolve disputes
- Enforce our agreements

You may request deletion of your data at any time.

---

## 8. Your Rights

Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

### 8.1 Access
- Request a copy of your personal data
- Know what information we have about you

### 8.2 Correction
- Update or correct inaccurate information
- Complete incomplete data

### 8.3 Deletion
- Request deletion of your personal data
- Note: Some data may be retained for legal purposes

### 8.4 Opt-Out
- Unsubscribe from marketing emails
- Disable cookies in your browser
- Opt out of targeted advertising

### 8.5 Portability
- Receive your data in a portable format

### 8.6 Restriction
- Request that we limit processing of your data

### 8.7 Objection
- Object to processing based on legitimate interests

**To exercise these rights, contact us at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}.**

---

## 9. Complaints

If you have concerns about our privacy practices:

1. Contact us first at {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}
2. If unsatisfied, you may lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority

---

## 10. International Users

### 10.1 Data Transfers

If you access our Site from outside {{GOVERNING_STATE}}, your information may be transferred to and processed in {{GOVERNING_STATE}} or other countries.

By using our Site, you consent to the transfer of your information to countries that may have different data protection laws.

### 10.2 GDPR (European Users)

If you are in the European Economic Area (EEA), you have rights under GDPR:

- Access, rectification, and erasure
- Data portability
- Restriction of processing
- Right to object
- Withdraw consent
- Lodge complaints with supervisory authorities

**Legal Bases for Processing:**
- Consent
- Contract performance
- Legitimate interests
- Legal obligations

### 10.3 CCPA (California Users)

California residents have additional rights:

- **Right to Know**: Request information about data collection
- **Right to Delete**: Request deletion of personal information
- **Right to Opt-Out**: Opt out of sale of personal information (we do not sell data)
- **Non-Discrimination**: We will not discriminate for exercising your rights

To submit a CCPA request, contact {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}.

---

## 11. Contact

Questions about this Privacy Policy? Contact us:

**{{COMPANY_NAME}}**
{{CONTACT_ADDRESS}}
Email: {{CONTACT_EMAIL}}
Website: {{WEBSITE_URL}}

---

*By using {{WEBSITE_URL}}, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.*
